item.title: If Bitcoin drops below $116,000, the mainstream CEX long liquidation volume will reach $2.078 billion
item.description: On August 15th, based on Coinglass data, if Bitcoin drops below $116,000, the cumulative long liquidation intensity of mainstream CEXs will reach $2.078 billion.Conversely, if Bitcoin exceeds $120,000, the cumulative short liquidation intensity of mainstream CEXs will reach $938 million.BlockBeats Note: The liquidation chart does not display the precise number of contracts to be liquidated or the exact value of the liquidated contracts. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to adjacent liquidation clusters, that is, intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what degree the price of the underlying asset will be influenced when it reaches a certain level. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that when the price reaches that level, it will trigger a stronger response due to a liquidity avalanche.

item.title: Bitcoin Briefly Drops Below $118,000
item.description: On August 15th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin briefly fell below $118,000 and is now trading at $118,068, showing a 24-hour decrease of 0.42%.

item.title: The US 30-year Treasury bond yield is 109 basis points higher than the 5-year yield, the widest level since 2021
item.description: On August 15th, the yield spread between the 30-year and 5-year U.S. Treasury bonds arrived at 109 basis points, which is the widest level since 2021. (FX168)

item.title: Trump: Set to Impose Semiconductor Tariffs, Possibly Up to 300%
item.description: On August 15th, President Trump of the United States declared that he would impose tariffs on semiconductors within the next two weeks. This is the latest indication that he is preparing to significantly expand the tariff system.Trump stated on Friday while on Air Force One on his way to a summit with Russian President Putin in Alaska, "I will decide on the tariffs for steel and chips next week and the week after. What I want to emphasize is about chips and semiconductors. We will make a determination next week or at some point in the following weeks." It is currently not clear whether Trump made a mistake regarding the steel tariff issue. He had already increased import tariffs on steel and aluminum to 50% in June. The President has repeatedly promised to impose tariffs on chips and drugs in the coming weeks but has not made a formal announcement yet.Furthermore, Trump also hinted that the tariffs on imported semiconductors may be even higher, saying, "The tariff rate I intend to

item.title: Qubic Releases Monero 51% Attack Experiment Report: Resulting in 6 Blocks Reorganized, 60 Blocks Orphaned
item.description: On August 15th, as per an official announcement, Qubic declared that it had attained over 51% hash rate control on the Monero network. This led to the reorganization of 6 blocks and the creation of 60 orphan blocks. Initial reports suggest that within a span of two hours, Qubic mined 80% of Monero's total blocks.During this period, approximately 750 XMR and 7 million XTM were mined. The unsold Tari from the previous round, combined with 7 million XTM, which amounts to 17.2 billion QUBIC, were burned at an average price of around 3,200 QUBIC per billion, equivalent to approximately $55,000. Compute nodes and miners jointly received rewards of 62.2 billion QUBIC, valued at around $200,000.The network's peak hash rate reached 2.71 GH/s, accounting for 52% of the global Monero hash rate. A total of 5,506 Monero blocks were mined. Data indicates that Qubic's current miner revenue is nearly four times that of Monero. The 51% Monero experiment is still in progress.

item.title: Hyperbeat has completed a $5.2 million seed round, with ether.fi Ventures and Electric Capital co-leading the investment.
item.description: On August 15th, as per CoinDesk, within the Hyperliquid ecosystem's native yield layer, Hyperbeat completed a $5.2 million oversubscribed seed round of financing. Ether.fi Ventures and Electric Capital took the lead in this. Other participants encompassed Coinbase Ventures, Chapter One, Selini, Maelstrom, Anchorage Digital, and supporters from the HyperCollective community.It is reported that Hyperbeat intends to construct permissionless financial infrastructure, enabling anyone to earn yield, stake, and conduct transactions directly from their on-chain portfolios.

item.title: A new address withdrew $10.2 million in LINK from Binance.
item.description: August 15th. As per the monitoring by LookOnChain, a newly established wallet address has withdrawn 455,298 LINK from Binance within the past 4 hours (approximately $10.2 million).

item.title: Binance Wallet will launch the OpenEden Booster event, with an Alpha Point threshold of 61 points.
item.description: August 15th. According to official channels, Binance Wallet is set to launch the OpenEden Booster event. Users whose Alpha points are greater than or equal to 61 are eligible to participate in this event. The event will commence on August 18th at 19:00 (UTC+8), and the total reward offered is 20,000,000 EDEN coins.

item.title: DeFi Development Allocates Around $22 Million to Purchase an Additional 110,000 SOL Tokens
item.description: On August 15th, as per globenewswire, DeFi Development Corp. (Nasdaq: DFDV) announced today that it presently holds around 1,420,173 SOL and SOL-equivalent assets on its balance sheet. This encompasses the rewards obtained through staking and on-chain activities.This growth was fuelled by the company's acquisition of 110,000 SOL at an average price of $201.68, with a total worth of approximately $22 million.

item.title: SEC Chair: Mobilizing All Departments to Make the U.S. a Global Cryptocurrency Center
item.description: August 15: Paul Atkins, who is the Chairman of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), declared that he is mobilizing all departments to transform the United States into a global center for Bitcoin and cryptocurrency.
